    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x36

          text run at (306,0) width 243: "If you see any red, the test has failed. "
          text run at (548,0) width 218: "This test is checking to make sure"
          text run at (0,18) width 560: "that boxes will shift to avoid floats that try to intrude into their space (just as tables do)."
